description.value:
A large banner or icon that must be carried in one hand or affixed to a sturdy backpack. When held aloft any who are Dedicated to Slaanesh who can see it can reroll all failed Willpower Tests (accepting rerolled result) and reduce all Damage received by 1 (minimum 1).

Requirements

Must be Dedicated to Slaanesh to use. Heretical.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
